reviewText: Excellent complete Season 1 with funny humor and situations!!
I love old reruns Videos are good to watch when nothing else is on .

This is the one to get, in B and W. If you are only gojng to watch a little Bewitched, the first season is the best for a lot of reasons. For one thing there is the nostalgia of seeing Elizabeth Montgomery in high heels and white gloves, circa 1964, as opposed to later seasons, where she was in mini-skirts and bra-less, the look of the early 70's. There was a lot of cultural and societal change in those years, and it is obvious in watching the show,

Then there is the on-screen chemistry of Samantha and Darrin, so deeply in love they are willing to overcome any obstacle, ie that they come from different cultures. In some of the scenes, I get the sense that Ms Montgomery was channeling her love for her real-life husband, with whom she had a whirlwind affair. Alas, their marriage didn't last and neither did the magic of this show.

Back in the early days, there was still some class and mystery about things. The cheap shots for a laugh got more and more frequent as Bewitched progressed and the writers apparently ran out of ideas. The last 2 seasons were really awful.

But the first season especially was quite good.
o yes it is wonderful just perfect condition

One great fun blast from the past.
Got this today. Came very fast. Great shape.
Worth every cent.  Going to get all the seasons.
Mill is doing a great job. And put CC ( Closed Caption ) on it. For the hard of hearing.
Something Shout is not good at......
If you are seeking a great fun Blast from the past. When TV was worth watching..
Get Bewitched. You will be glad you did.
